FarStoneÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s TotalRecovery 7 Express is a hard drive utility that provides complete PC backup & recovery with no installation required. Simply restart your system and boot into the TotalRecovery 7 Express built-in operating system to backup or restore your entire system or files. TotalRecovery Express is fast, easy and leaves no imprint on your hard drive!


FarStone TotalRecovery 7 can be used for various purposes. PC users can use TotalRecoveryTM Express as a quick and easy way to back up and restore their data in the event of a system crash. System administrators can use it to dramatically reduce the time they spend restoring, reconfiguring or copying data onto the hard drives of many computers. FarStone TotalRecovery 7 Express also allows you to simply upgrade and migrate your data and Windows to a newly purchased hard drive. It takes only minutes for TotalRecovery 7 to completely move everything including files, photos, music, application settings, and your operating system. Whether you need to back up, recover, protect or upgrade PCs, TotalRecoveryTM Express is an all-in-one solution.

FarStone TotalRecovery 7 Express Key Features:

    Instant backup (disk imaging) recovery with no installation required
    Seamlessly upgrade to a new hard drive or migrate to a new PC
    Retrieve files from a crashed system with the built-in Recovery Manager
    Powerful Universal Restore function restores to dissimilar hardware
    Go Green! No installation Required!
